Class RaplaCategoryChoiceDialog.RaplaCategoryOnClickListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rapla.mobile.android.app.RaplaCategoryChoiceDialog.RaplaCategoryOnClickListener
  • Enclosing class:
    RaplaCategoryChoiceDialog

    public static class RaplaCategoryChoiceDialog.RaplaCategoryOnClickListener
extends java.lang.Object
    This listener class listens to clicks on rapla category names and allows for drilling down on the clicked category.
    Author:
    Maximilian Lenkeit
